item.description: A coming-of-age alt-sports saga where brotherhood, scholarship, and icy dreams meet in a Princeton fieldhouse. From lax to law to the NHL‚Äîthis is the epic tale of how two friends rewrote the script of race, class, and dreams through the most unlikely team sport pairings.
